station.name: The Gates Radio Station
station.desc: From the Classroom to the Airwaves
station.longDesc: The Gates Primary School Radio — broadcasting live from our classrooms! Tune in to hear our students take the mic with music, stories, news, and fun. Run by the pupils of Gates Primary, our station brings the school to life through the airwaves. Whether it's interviews, shout-outs, or the songs our kids love, there's always something great to listen to. From the classroom to the airwaves — this is our school, our sound, our station.
